nodes.text: Calo Arawan was a male Human gladiator living during the beginning of the war against Zakuul. In 3631 BBY he fought in the Grand Arena on Zakuul alongside Kordath and Veran Anjek against Bowdaar and the Alliance Commander, in a match arranged by Valdos Dofine. Calo Arawan's side lost the fight and all three were killed in the match.
Calo Arawan appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire during Bowdaar Alliance alert mission.
